CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Present Topic answers in Context Region from Search
CurrentVersion.description: Moving Topics answer from mainline to Context Region to build up the search pattern to find knowledge entities in right panel. We apologize for the inconvenience, this item is being removed from the roadmap as it is no longer accurate.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Present Topic answers in Context Region from Search
OldVersion.description: Moving Topics answer from mainline to Context Region to build up the search pattern to find knowledge entities in right panel.

CurrentVersion.title: OneDrive: Update to settings pane for PC folder backup
CurrentVersion.description: OneDrive plans to make a change to the settings pane for the PC folder backup feature (sometime called Known Folder Move). This settings pane is found by going to OneDrive icon in the system tray then selecting Settings-> Sync and backup-> Manage backup. The change will introduce toggle buttons to the settings pane along with information showing how much storage, of an end users total storage allotment, will be used by the feature. There is no change to the PC folder backup feature itself which, when enabled, automatically syncs your end user’s Desktop, Documents and Pictures folders on their Windows PC to their OneDrive. We apologize for the inconvenience; this item is being removed from the roadmap as it is no longer accurate.

OldVersion.title: OneDrive: Update to settings pane for PC folder backup
OldVersion.description: OneDrive plans to make a change to the settings pane for the PC folder backup feature (sometime called Known Folder Move). This settings pane is found by going to OneDrive icon in the system tray then selecting Settings-> Sync and backup-> Manage backup. The change will introduce toggle buttons to the settings pane along with information showing how much storage, of an end users total storage allotment, will be used by the feature. There is no change to the PC folder backup feature itself which, when enabled, automatically syncs your end user’s Desktop, Documents and Pictures folders on their Windows PC to their OneDrive.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 App: Customize App Bar
CurrentVersion.description: ,This feature enables users to pin and unpin apps to the App Bar on the side of the Microsoft 365 Web and Desktop App. We apologize for the inconvenience, this item is being removed from the roadmap as it is no longer accurate.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft 365 App: Customize App Bar
OldVersion.description: ,This feature enables users to pin and unpin apps to the App Bar on the side of the Microsoft 365 Web and Desktop App.

CurrentVersion.title: Whiteboard: Existing Azure Board Migration
CurrentVersion.description: This feature will migrate boards that exist in your tenant's Azure storage to OneDrive for Business storage. More information will follow as we near release.

OldVersion.title: Whiteboard: Existing Azure Board Migration
OldVersion.description: This feature will migrate boards that exist in your tenant's Azure storage to OneDrive for Business storage. More information will follow as we near release.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva:  Ask me anything events
CurrentVersion.description: All users can create moderated Q&A events from their storyline page.  AMAs include question upvoting & sorting, best answer, and optional anonymous submission. We apologize for the inconvenience; this item is being removed from the roadmap as it is no longer accurate.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva:  Ask me anything events
OldVersion.description: All users can create moderated Q&A events from their storyline page.  AMAs include question upvoting & sorting, best answer, and optional anonymous submission.

CurrentVersion.title: Office 365: Support for new information protection configuration for labels based on files vs. emails
CurrentVersion.description:
,Word, Excel, PowerPoint, and Outlook on iOS and
Android will support admin settings to have different set of sensitivity
labels. We apologize for the inconvenience; this item is being removed from the roadmap as it is no longer accurate.

OldVersion.title: Office 365: Support for new information protection configuration for labels based on files vs. emails
OldVersion.description:
,Word, Excel, PowerPoint, and Outlook on iOS and
Android will support admin settings to have different set of sensitivity
labels.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Actionable card based Loop components
CurrentVersion.description: Add a Microsoft 365 app that supports link unfurling with an actionable card-based Loop component, and Outlook will show the component when inserting supported links in your email messages. You will be able to choose between the new embedded card or a link when sending email.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Actionable card based Loop components
OldVersion.description: Add a Microsoft 365 app that supports link unfurling with an actionable card-based Loop component, and Outlook will show the component when inserting supported links in your email messages. You will be able to choose between the new embedded card or a link when sending email.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Video Pages
CurrentVersion.description: Create video centric page content, like highlighting meeting content or executive messages with the new video pages templates - presenting them inline, playable, and beautiful. These templates are available in both SharePoint and Stream, making it easy to showcase video with a customized and branded pages experience from either application.

OldVersion.title: SharePoint: Video Pages
OldVersion.description: Create video centric page content, like highlighting meeting content or executive messages with the new video pages templates - presenting them inline, playable, and beautiful. These templates are available in both SharePoint and Stream, making it easy to showcase video with a customized and branded pages experience from either application.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Collaborate on SharePoint pages and news with co-authoring
CurrentVersion.description: Multiple authors can collaborate on a SharePoint page or news at the same time.

OldVersion.title: SharePoint: Collaborate on SharePoint pages and news with co-authoring
OldVersion.description: Multiple authors can collaborate on a SharePoint page or news at the same time.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Protection of password protected, unscannable, and partially scannable document
CurrentVersion.description:
,
We are releasing three predicates in the SharePoint DLP area that will provide protection of password protected, unscannable, and partially scannable documents.

OldVersion.description:
,We are releasing three predicates in the SharePoint
DLP area that will provide protection of password protected, unscannable, and
partially scannable documents.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview Information Protection: Office Apps on the Web can create PDFs that inherit the source files sensitivity labels
CurrentVersion.description: PDFs created from Word, Excel, and PowerPoint will inherit their source files sensitivity labels in Office for the Web when the label is unencrypted.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview Information Protection: Office Apps on the Web can create PDFs that inherit the source files sensitivity labels
OldVersion.description: PDFs created from Word, Excel, and PowerPoint will inherit their source files sensitivity labels in Office for the Web when the label is unencrypted.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Self service to set survey deactivation times
CurrentVersion.description: Improved self service; Ability to set survey deactivation time

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Self service to set survey deactivation times
OldVersion.description: Improved self service; Ability to set survey deactivation time

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Self service to relink surveys
CurrentVersion.description: Improved self service; Ability to relink surveys to programs in progress

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Self service to relink surveys
OldVersion.description: Improved self service; Ability to relink surveys to programs in progress

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Email signature exclusion
CurrentVersion.description: Images in email signatures are by default treated as attachments, which could make it seem like a user is sending emails with attachments many times a day, creating many false alerts in Insider Risk Management. With this update, admins can choose to exclude images in signatures automatically to reduce noisy signals. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies to manage security and compliance. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Email signature exclusion
OldVersion.description:
Images in email signatures are by default
treated as attachments, which could make it seem like a user is sending emails
with attachments many times a day, creating many false alerts in Insider Risk
Management. With this update, admins can choose to exclude images in signatures
automatically to reduce noisy signals. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk
Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or
inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security
violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies to
manage security and compliance. Built with privacy by design, users are
pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in
place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Exact Data Match adding support for role-based access control (RBAC) for EDM upload authorization
CurrentVersion.description: Customers will be able to choose to leverage RBAC to authorize users for uploading data to the Exact Data Match (EDM) service instead of leveraging the EDM_DataUploaders security group for authorization.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Exact Data Match adding support for role-based access control (RBAC) for EDM upload authorization
OldVersion.description: Customers will be able to choose to leverage RBAC to authorize users for uploading data to the Exact Data Match (EDM) service instead of leveraging the EDM_DataUploaders security group for authorization.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Stream video recordings in the new Outlook for Windows and web
CurrentVersion.description: We're introducing the ability to record and insert Stream video recordings in Outlook on the web and the new Outlook for Windows. Soon you will be able to record a video of yourself, your screen or both, directly from Outlook and insert the recording in your email.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Stream video recordings in the new Outlook for Windows and web
OldVersion.description: We're introducing the ability to record and insert Stream video recordings in Outlook on the web and the new Outlook for Windows. Soon you will be able to record a video of yourself, your screen or both, directly from Outlook and insert the recording in your email.

CurrentVersion.title: Visio: Custom shapes in Visio for the web [Visio Plan 2]
CurrentVersion.description: Users with a Visio Plan 2 license will be able to use third-party custom shapes to create diagrams in Visio for the web.

OldVersion.title: Visio: Custom shapes in Visio for the web [Visio Plan 2]
OldVersion.description: Users with a Visio Plan 2 license will be able to use third-party custom shapes to create diagrams in Visio for the web.

CurrentVersion.title: Visio: Edit legacy .vsd files in Visio for the web [Visio Plan 1, Plan 2]
CurrentVersion.description: Users with a Visio Plan 1 or Visio Plan 2 license will be able to edit legacy .vsd files in Visio for the web by creating an exact copy (except macros) and saving it in the latest .vsdx format.

OldVersion.title: Visio: Edit legacy .vsd files in Visio for the web [Visio Plan 1, Plan 2]
OldVersion.description: Users with a Visio Plan 1 or Visio Plan 2 license will be able to edit legacy .vsd files in Visio for the web by creating an exact copy (except macros) and saving it in the latest .vsdx format.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Reference PDF files in Copilot in Word
CurrentVersion.description: Users can now reference PDF files for Copilot to work with while generating content in Word.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Reference PDF files in Copilot in Word
OldVersion.description: Users can now reference PDF files for Copilot to work with while generating content in Word.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Bing search integration brings the power of the web to your chats in Word
CurrentVersion.description: Ask Copilot a question in Word chat, and Copilot generates an answer using the power of integrated Bing search. And you never have to leave the app.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Bing search integration brings the power of the web to your chats in Word
OldVersion.description: Ask Copilot a question in Word chat, and Copilot generates an answer using the power of integrated Bing search. And you never have to leave the app.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Current web content included when drafting with Copilot in Word
CurrentVersion.description: Draft with Copilot will include information from Bing search, resulting in content that's as current as what you would find when searching with Bing on the web.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Access to M365 header
CurrentVersion.description: Solution displays M365 header in Viva Glint to improve discoverability of other M365 apps

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Access to M365 header
OldVersion.description: Solution displays M365 header in Viva Glint to improve discoverability of other M365 apps

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Enhanced privacy control: Limiting PII data access to "Data Classification Content Viewer" role
CurrentVersion.description: ,With this change, an additional role will be introduced which will be required to "View Source" content and expand on "Sensitive Info Type" surrounding context within Activity Explorer. Only users with the specific role of "Data Classification Content Viewers" will be able to access this sensitive data.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Enhanced privacy control: Limiting PII data access to "Data Classification Content Viewer" role
OldVersion.description: ,With this change, an additional role will be introduced which will be required to "View Source" content and expand on "Sensitive Info Type" surrounding context within Activity Explorer. Only users with the specific role of "Data Classification Content Viewers" will be able to access this sensitive data.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Audit - New filters in Audit Search
CurrentVersion.description: ,Audit Search allows customers to retrieve audit logs relevant to a security or compliance investigation. With this change, customers will now be able to search for relevant audit logs using additional fields such as Record ID, UserKey, UserType, and ClientIP.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Audit - New filters in Audit Search
OldVersion.description: ,Audit Search allows customers to retrieve audit logs relevant to a security or compliance investigation. With this change, customers will now be able to search for relevant audit logs using additional fields such as Record ID, UserKey, UserType, and ClientIP.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview: Microsoft Information Protection - Exact Data Match adding support for role-based access control (RBAC) for EDM upload authorization
CurrentVersion.description: Customers will be able to choose to leverage RBAC to authorize users for uploading data to the Exact Data Match (EDM) service instead of leveraging the EDM_DataUploaders security group for authorization.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview: Microsoft Information Protection - Exact Data Match adding support for role-based access control (RBAC) for EDM upload authorization
OldVersion.description: Customers will be able to choose to leverage RBAC to authorize users for uploading data to the Exact Data Match (EDM) service instead of leveraging the EDM_DataUploaders security group for authorization.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: eDiscovery - eDiscovery Graph API for purge enhancements to include Exchange items and expand purge limit from 10 to 100
CurrentVersion.description: Now eDiscovery admins using the eDiscovery Graph APIs for purge to remove misplaced emails and or Teams messages from their storage locations can use the eDiscovery Graph API for both Exchange email items and Teams messages. In addition, the prior limit of 10 items per storage location will be expanded to 100 items per storage location.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: eDiscovery - eDiscovery Graph API for purge enhancements to include Exchange items and expand purge limit from 10 to 100
OldVersion.description: Now eDiscovery admins using the eDiscovery Graph APIs for purge to remove misplaced emails and or Teams messages from their storage locations can use the eDiscovery Graph API for both Exchange email items and Teams messages. In addition, the prior limit of 10 items per storage location will be expanded to 100 items per storage location.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention for endpoints - Optical Character Recognition (OCR) on Mac Endpoints
CurrentVersion.description: ,In Purview policies like Data loss prevention (DLP), auto labelling can scan for sensitive content in most of the textual files, but images are not supported for content scanning today on Mac endpoint devices. We are adding OCR support on Mac endpoints to detect sensitive content in images and apply policies to protect these images.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention for endpoints - Optical Character Recognition (OCR) on Mac Endpoints
OldVersion.description: ,In Purview policies like Data loss prevention (DLP), auto labelling can scan for sensitive content in most of the textual files, but images are not supported for content scanning today on Mac endpoint devices. We are adding OCR support on Mac endpoints to detect sensitive content in images and apply policies to protect these images.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Exfiltration of business-sensitive data to free public domain emails
CurrentVersion.description:
,In this update, we are enhancing the existing email insight alerts to provide additional information when business-sensitive data is potentially leaked from a work email account to a free public domain email, potentially leading to a data security incident. The new domain detection group "Free public domains" will list the common domains used for personal email accounts. Admins with appropriate permissions can choose to select these domains in their indicator variants.

Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Exfiltration of business-sensitive data to free public domain emails
OldVersion.description:
,In this update, we are enhancing the existing email insight alerts to provide additional information when business-sensitive data is potentially leaked from a work email account to a free public domain email, potentially leading to a data security incident. The new domain detection group "Free public domains" will list the common domains used for personal email accounts. Admins with appropriate permissions can choose to select these domains in their indicator variants.

Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Speaker recognition and attribution for all Teams Rooms on Windows
CurrentVersion.description:
Intelligent speaker recognition is being enabled for all Teams Rooms on Windows environments, with intelligent speakers or on existing speakers via the cloud. This feature identifies and attributes people in live transcripts, utilizing a unique "voiceprint" for each participant. Copilot in Teams can deliver meeting summaries, insights, and action items attributing contributions to individual speakers. Users can enroll voices in the Teams Desktop. Learn more at the link below.
More info: https://aka.ms/voiceprofile

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Speaker recognition and attribution for all Teams Rooms on Windows
OldVersion.description:
Intelligent speaker recognition is being enabled for all Teams Rooms on Windows environments, with intelligent speakers or on existing speakers via the cloud. This feature identifies and attributes people in live transcripts, utilizing a unique "voiceprint" for each participant. Copilot in Teams can deliver meeting summaries, insights, and action items attributing contributions to individual speakers. Users can enroll voices in the Teams Desktop. Learn more at the link below.
More info: https://aka.ms/voiceprofile

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Swipe in the Message List on Outlook on the Web and the New Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: The Message List will now support Swipe from Left and Swipe from Right actions on Outlook on the Web and the New Outlook for Windows. As a result, some minor organization changes will also happen for the hover actions. #newoutlookforwindows

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Swipe in the Message List on Outlook on the Web and the New Outlook for Windows
OldVersion.description: The Message List will now support Swipe from Left and Swipe from Right actions on Outlook on the Web and the New Outlook for Windows. As a result, some minor organization changes will also happen for the hover actions. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Meeting Details in the Reading Pane on Outlook on the Web and the New Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: When a conversation in Mail is part of a meeting, the Reading Pane will have a new and improved Meeting Details card for a more efficient and modern RSVP flow. This will come to Outlook on the Web and the New Outlook for Windows. #newoutlookforwindows

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Meeting Details in the Reading Pane on Outlook on the Web and the New Outlook for Windows
OldVersion.description: When a conversation in Mail is part of a meeting, the Reading Pane will have a new and improved Meeting Details card for a more efficient and modern RSVP flow. This will come to Outlook on the Web and the New Outlook for Windows. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Teams devices - Cancel scheduled device operations through Teams admin center
CurrentVersion.description: If a device operation is no longer required, admins will be able to cancel scheduled device operations like, Software update and device restart, through Teams admin center.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Teams devices - Cancel scheduled device operations through Teams admin center
OldVersion.description: If a device operation is no longer required, admins will be able to cancel scheduled device operations like, Software update and device restart, through Teams admin center.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Channel cards
CurrentVersion.description: Channel cards will provide you quick overview of key information about what is happening within the channel, including who is in the channel and the purpose of the channel.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Channel cards
OldVersion.description: Channel cards will provide you quick overview of key information about what is happening within the channel, including who is in the channel and the purpose of the channel.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 app: Use Microsoft Purview to prevent some connected experiences that analyze content
CurrentVersion.description:
Use a new sensitivity label setting or protection with Double Key Encryption to prevent content within Word, Excel, PowerPoint, and Outlook from being sent to Microsoft for content analysis as a privacy control, even when these are stored in Microsoft’s cloud, such as SharePoint or OneDrive. This helps your organization to optimize your data privacy needs on a per-content basis using the familiar configurations and end-user experiences available with Microsoft Purview.
More info: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/purview/sensitivity-labels-office-apps#prevent-some-connected-experiences-that-analyze-content

OldVersion.title: Microsoft 365 app: Use Microsoft Purview to prevent some connected experiences that analyze content
OldVersion.description:
Use a new sensitivity label setting or protection with Double Key Encryption to prevent content within Word, Excel, PowerPoint, and Outlook from being sent to Microsoft for content analysis as a privacy control, even when these are stored in Microsoft’s cloud, such as SharePoint or OneDrive. This helps your organization to optimize your data privacy needs on a per-content basis using the familiar configurations and end-user experiences available with Microsoft Purview.
More info: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/purview/sensitivity-labels-office-apps#prevent-some-connected-experiences-that-analyze-content

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Excel – Preview and "Apply" changes suggested by Copilot
CurrentVersion.description: Previously, when a user asked Copilot to make changes to their table data, Copilot would make the changes directly. Now, Copilot will respond with a description of the planned changes, along with a button to "Apply". Users can choose to refine before applying. This provides more user awareness and control over Copilot's changes.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot takes emails and meetings into account while drafting content in Word
CurrentVersion.description: You will no longer need to reference certain types of organizational data for Copilot to generate contextually relevant content. People and chats will still need to be referenced explicitly.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Insights manager, leader, and advanced insights available for GCC
CurrentVersion.description: Viva Insights is pleased to announce that manager, leader, and advanced insights will be available for GCC June 30, 2023. These premium insights help organizations understand and predict the impact of day-to-day actions to continuously improve the outcomes they care about.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Insights manager, leader, and advanced insights available for GCC
OldVersion.description: Viva Insights is pleased to announce that manager, leader, and advanced insights will be available for GCC June 30, 2023. These premium insights help organizations understand and predict the impact of day-to-day actions to continuously improve the outcomes they care about.

CurrentVersion.title: Visio: Mind maps in Visio for the web [Visio Plan 1, Plan 2]
CurrentVersion.description: Brainstorm and capture information in a structured format that makes it easy to understand and recall with new mind map shapes in Visio for the web.

OldVersion.title: Visio: Mind maps in Visio for the web [Visio Plan 1, Plan 2]
OldVersion.description: Brainstorm and capture information in a structured format that makes it easy to understand and recall with new mind map shapes in Visio for the web.

CurrentVersion.title: Excel: Automatically hide the ribbon in Excel for the Web
CurrentVersion.description: Users can now set the ribbon to automatically hide to focus on the content and the grid, expand and access the ribbon whenever required. The ribbon mode can be set from the ribbon switcher control on the bottom right of the ribbon. We apologize for the inconvenience; this item is being removed from the roadmap as it is no longer accurate.

OldVersion.title: Excel: Automatically hide the ribbon in Excel for the Web
OldVersion.description: Users can now set the ribbon to automatically hide to focus on the content and the grid, expand and access the ribbon whenever required. The ribbon mode can be set from the ribbon switcher control on the bottom right of the ribbon.

CurrentVersion.title: PowerPoint: Organization Fonts in PowerPoint for Mac and mobile
CurrentVersion.description:
This feature will allow organizations to add
their custom fonts into PowerPoint. We apologize for the inconvenience, this item is being removed from the roadmap as it is no longer accurate.

OldVersion.title: PowerPoint: Organization Fonts in PowerPoint for Mac and mobile

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Edge: Test Base for Microsoft 365 Testing support for Microsoft 365 apps and Edge
CurrentVersion.description:
,Test Base will support testing of how your app works with newer versions of Edge and the monthly update channel of the Microsoft 365 client applications. This feature was not fully shipped as Test Base went end of life on March 4, 2024. See the blog post at the link below. We apologize for the inconvenience, this item is being removed from the roadmap as it is no longer accurate.
More info: https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/t5/windows-it-pro-blog/test-base-for-microsoft-365-end-of-life-announcement/ba-p/4094588

There is no change to the PC folder backup feature itself which, when enabled, automatically syncs your end user’s Desktop, Documents and Pictures folders on their Windows PC to their OneDrive. CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Email signature exclusion
CurrentVersion.description: Images in email signatures are by default treated as attachments, which could make it seem like a user is sending emails with attachments many times a day, creating many false alerts in Insider Risk Management. With this update, admins can choose to exclude images in signatures automatically to reduce noisy signals. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies to manage security and compliance. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Exact Data Match adding support for role-based access control (RBAC) for EDM upload authorization
CurrentVersion.description: Customers will be able to choose to leverage RBAC to authorize users for uploading data to the Exact Data Match (EDM) service instead of leveraging the EDM_DataUploaders security group for authorization.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Stream video recordings in the new Outlook for Windows and web
CurrentVersion.description: We're introducing the ability to record and insert Stream video recordings in Outlook on the web and the new Outlook for Windows. Soon you will be able to record a video of yourself, your screen or both, directly from Outlook and insert the recording in your email.

CurrentVersion.title: Visio: Custom shapes in Visio for the web [Visio Plan 2]
CurrentVersion.description: Users with a Visio Plan 2 license will be able to use third-party custom shapes to create diagrams in Visio for the web.

CurrentVersion.title: Visio: Edit legacy .vsd files in Visio for the web [Visio Plan 1, Plan 2]
CurrentVersion.description: Users with a Visio Plan 1 or Visio Plan 2 license will be able to edit legacy .vsd files in Visio for the web by creating an exact copy (except macros) and saving it in the latest .vsdx format.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Reference PDF files in Copilot in Word
CurrentVersion.description: Users can now reference PDF files for Copilot to work with while generating content in Word.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Bing search integration brings the power of the web to your chats in Word
CurrentVersion.description: Ask Copilot a question in Word chat, and Copilot generates an answer using the power of integrated Bing search. And you never have to leave the app.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Current web content included when drafting with Copilot in Word
CurrentVersion.description: Draft with Copilot will include information from Bing search, resulting in content that's as current as what you would find when searching with Bing on the web.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Access to M365 header
CurrentVersion.description: Solution displays M365 header in Viva Glint to improve discoverability of other M365 apps

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Enhanced privacy control: Limiting PII data access to "Data Classification Content Viewer" role
CurrentVersion.description: ,With this change, an additional role will be introduced which will be required to "View Source" content and expand on "Sensitive Info Type" surrounding context within Activity Explorer. Only users with the specific role of "Data Classification Content Viewers" will be able to access this sensitive data.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Audit - New filters in Audit Search
CurrentVersion.description: ,Audit Search allows customers to retrieve audit logs relevant to a security or compliance investigation. With this change, customers will now be able to search for relevant audit logs using additional fields such as Record ID, UserKey, UserType, and ClientIP.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview: Microsoft Information Protection - Exact Data Match adding support for role-based access control (RBAC) for EDM upload authorization
CurrentVersion.description: Customers will be able to choose to leverage RBAC to authorize users for uploading data to the Exact Data Match (EDM) service instead of leveraging the EDM_DataUploaders security group for authorization.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: eDiscovery - eDiscovery Graph API for purge enhancements to include Exchange items and expand purge limit from 10 to 100
CurrentVersion.description: Now eDiscovery admins using the eDiscovery Graph APIs for purge to remove misplaced emails and or Teams messages from their storage locations can use the eDiscovery Graph API for both Exchange email items and Teams messages. In addition, the prior limit of 10 items per storage location will be expanded to 100 items per storage location.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention for endpoints - Optical Character Recognition (OCR) on Mac Endpoints
CurrentVersion.description: ,In Purview policies like Data loss prevention (DLP), auto labelling can scan for sensitive content in most of the textual files, but images are not supported for content scanning today on Mac endpoint devices. We are adding OCR support on Mac endpoints to detect sensitive content in images and apply policies to protect these images.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Exfiltration of business-sensitive data to free public domain emails
CurrentVersion.description:
,In this update, we are enhancing the existing email insight alerts to provide additional information when business-sensitive data is potentially leaked from a work email account to a free public domain email, potentially leading to a data security incident. The new domain detection group "Free public domains" will list the common domains used for personal email accounts. Admins with appropriate permissions can choose to select these domains in their indicator variants.

Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Speaker recognition and attribution for all Teams Rooms on Windows
CurrentVersion.description:
Intelligent speaker recognition is being enabled for all Teams Rooms on Windows environments, with intelligent speakers or on existing speakers via the cloud. This feature identifies and attributes people in live transcripts, utilizing a unique "voiceprint" for each participant. Copilot in Teams can deliver meeting summaries, insights, and action items attributing contributions to individual speakers. Users can enroll voices in the Teams Desktop. Learn more at the link below.
More info: https://aka.ms/voiceprofile

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Swipe in the Message List on Outlook on the Web and the New Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: The Message List will now support Swipe from Left and Swipe from Right actions on Outlook on the Web and the New Outlook for Windows. As a result, some minor organization changes will also happen for the hover actions. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Meeting Details in the Reading Pane on Outlook on the Web and the New Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: When a conversation in Mail is part of a meeting, the Reading Pane will have a new and improved Meeting Details card for a more efficient and modern RSVP flow. This will come to Outlook on the Web and the New Outlook for Windows. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Teams devices - Cancel scheduled device operations through Teams admin center
CurrentVersion.description: If a device operation is no longer required, admins will be able to cancel scheduled device operations like, Software update and device restart, through Teams admin center.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Channel cards
CurrentVersion.description: Channel cards will provide you quick overview of key information about what is happening within the channel, including who is in the channel and the purpose of the channel.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 app: Use Microsoft Purview to prevent some connected experiences that analyze content
CurrentVersion.description:
Use a new sensitivity label setting or protection with Double Key Encryption to prevent content within Word, Excel, PowerPoint, and Outlook from being sent to Microsoft for content analysis as a privacy control, even when these are stored in Microsoft’s cloud, such as SharePoint or OneDrive. This helps your organization to optimize your data privacy needs on a per-content basis using the familiar configurations and end-user experiences available with Microsoft Purview.
More info: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/purview/sensitivity-labels-office-apps#prevent-some-connected-experiences-that-analyze-content

CurrentVersion.title: Word: Reference PDF files in Copilot in Word
CurrentVersion.description: Users can now reference PDF files for Copilot to work with while generating content in Word.

CurrentVersion.title: Word: Reference PDF files in Copilot in Word
CurrentVersion.description: Users can now reference PDF files for Copilot to work with while generating content in Word.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Reference PDF files in Copilot in Word
CurrentVersion.description: Users can now reference PDF files for Copilot to work with while generating content in Word.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Excel – Preview and "Apply" changes suggested by Copilot
CurrentVersion.description: Previously, when a user asked Copilot to make changes to their table data, Copilot would make the changes directly. Now, Copilot will respond with a description of the planned changes, along with a button to "Apply". Users can choose to refine before applying. This provides more user awareness and control over Copilot's changes.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot takes emails and meetings into account while drafting content in Word
CurrentVersion.description: You will no longer need to reference certain types of organizational data for Copilot to generate contextually relevant content. People and chats will still need to be referenced explicitly.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Insights manager, leader, and advanced insights available for GCC
CurrentVersion.description: Viva Insights is pleased to announce that manager, leader, and advanced insights will be available for GCC June 30, 2023. These premium insights help organizations understand and predict the impact of day-to-day actions to continuously improve the outcomes they care about.

CurrentVersion.title: Visio: Mind maps in Visio for the web [Visio Plan 1, Plan 2]
CurrentVersion.description: Brainstorm and capture information in a structured format that makes it easy to understand and recall with new mind map shapes in Visio for the web.

CurrentVersion.title: Excel: Automatically hide the ribbon in Excel for the Web
CurrentVersion.description: Users can now set the ribbon to automatically hide to focus on the content and the grid, expand and access the ribbon whenever required. The ribbon mode can be set from the ribbon switcher control on the bottom right of the ribbon. We apologize for the inconvenience; this item is being removed from the roadmap as it is no longer accurate.

CurrentVersion.title: PowerPoint: Organization Fonts in PowerPoint for Mac and mobile
CurrentVersion.description:
This feature will allow organizations to add
their custom fonts into PowerPoint. We apologize for the inconvenience, this item is being removed from the roadmap as it is no longer accurate.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Edge: Test Base for Microsoft 365 Testing support for Microsoft 365 apps and Edge
CurrentVersion.description:
,Test Base will support testing of how your app works with newer versions of Edge and the monthly update channel of the Microsoft 365 client applications. This feature was not fully shipped as Test Base went end of life on March 4, 2024. See the blog post at the link below. We apologize for the inconvenience, this item is being removed from the roadmap as it is no longer accurate.
More info: https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/t5/windows-it-pro-blog/test-base-for-microsoft-365-end-of-life-announcement/ba-p/4094588
